trans-unit.source: The ad mediator control and the related developer tools are available in the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.
trans-unit.target: The ad mediator control and the related developer tools are available in the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.

trans-unit.source: Install the Universal Ad Client SDK
trans-unit.target: Install the Universal Ad Client SDK

trans-unit.source: Install the Universal Ad Client SDK
trans-unit.target: Install the Universal Ad Client SDK

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: The ad mediator control and the related developer tools are available in the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.
trans-unit.target: The ad mediator control and the related developer tools are available in the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK.

trans-unit.source: This SDK is an extension to Visual Studio 2013 or Visual Studio 2015.
trans-unit.target: This SDK is an extension to Visual Studio 2013 or Visual Studio 2015.

trans-unit.source: To install the SDK:
trans-unit.target: To install the SDK:

trans-unit.source: Close all instances of Visual Studio 2013 or Visual Studio 2015 and uninstall any previous versions of the ad mediator extension or Microsoft Advertising SDK.
trans-unit.target: Close all instances of Visual Studio 2013 or Visual Studio 2015 and uninstall any previous versions of the ad mediator extension or Microsoft Advertising SDK.

trans-unit.source: Download and install the [Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518026).
trans-unit.target: Download and install the [Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518026).

trans-unit.source: It may take a few minutes to install.
trans-unit.target: It may take a few minutes to install.

trans-unit.source: Be sure and wait until the process has finished.
trans-unit.target: Be sure and wait until the process has finished.

trans-unit.source: Restart Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Restart Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: **Note** To install the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK with Visual Studio 2015, you must have version 1.1 or later of the Visual Studio Tools for Universal Windows Apps installed.
trans-unit.target: **Note** To install the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK with Visual Studio 2015, you must have version 1.1 or later of the Visual Studio Tools for Universal Windows Apps installed.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this update to the Visual Studio Tools for Universal Windows Apps, see the [release notes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=624516).
trans-unit.target: For more information about this update to the Visual Studio Tools for Universal Windows Apps, see the [release notes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=624516).

trans-unit.source: Update an existing project to use the latest version of the SDK
trans-unit.target: Update an existing project to use the latest version of the SDK

trans-unit.source: Microsoft periodically releases new versions of the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK with new ad mediation features, such as support for additional ad networks.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft periodically releases new versions of the Microsoft Universal Ad Client SDK with new ad mediation features, such as support for additional ad networks.

trans-unit.source: If you have existing projects that use an earlier version of the SDK and you want to use the latest version, follow these instructions:
trans-unit.target: If you have existing projects that use an earlier version of the SDK and you want to use the latest version, follow these instructions:

trans-unit.source: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518026) and run the latest release of the installer.
trans-unit.target: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=518026) and run the latest release of the installer.

trans-unit.source: Open each of your existing project in Visual Studio, and follow the [Configure ad networks](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md#configure-ad-networks) steps again to configure each of the ad networks used by your app.
trans-unit.target: Open each of your existing project in Visual Studio, and follow the [Configure ad networks](add-and-use-the-ad-mediator-control.md#configure-ad-networks) steps again to configure each of the ad networks used by your app.

trans-unit.source: This process installs the latest versions of each of the ad network assemblies.
trans-unit.target: This process installs the latest versions of each of the ad network assemblies.

trans-unit.source: If you have a Windows Phone 8 or Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight project, also perform these additional steps to ensure that the correct versions of the ad mediator assemblies are used by the app:
trans-unit.target: If you have a Windows Phone 8 or Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight project, also perform these additional steps to ensure that the correct versions of the ad mediator assemblies are used by the app:

trans-unit.source: Open your project in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Open your project in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: In **Solution Explorer**, expand **References**.
trans-unit.target: In **Solution Explorer**, expand **References**.

trans-unit.source: Right-click **Microsoft.AdMediator.Core** and choose **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click **Microsoft.AdMediator.Core** and choose **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: Set the **Specific Version** property to **False**.
trans-unit.target: Set the **Specific Version** property to **False**.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 3-4 for **Microsoft.AdMediator.WindowsPhone8**.
trans-unit.target: Repeat steps 3-4 for **Microsoft.AdMediator.WindowsPhone8**.
